char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Because you defeated us both, you will probably find a solution to this troubling incident.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You will probably restore it in no time. Will you not be beaten by this?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There is no way I can fail, fushinja.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Thanks a lot for insulting me again. I'm out of here.
